import illustrationImg from '../images/illustration.svg' import logoImg from '../images/logo.svg' import googleIconImg from '../images/google-icon.svg' import '.././styles/auth.scss' import { Button } from '../components/Button' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import {firebase,auth} from '../services/firebase' import { TestContext } from '../App' import { useContext} from 'react' export function Home(){ const history = useHistory(); const value = useContext(TestContext) function handleCreateRoom(){ const provider = new firebase.auth.GoogleAuthProvider() auth.signInWithPopup(provider).then(result => { history.push('/rooms/new'); }) } return(
